messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the pursuer catches the fleeing character?
The game picks up the action at the most exciting moment—the point where the pursuer is closing in on the fleeing character.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What roll is used to adjust each participant's MOV rating during the chase?
Speed Roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of roll is made by a character on foot or other self-propelled mode during the chase?
A CON roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of roll is made by a driver during the chase?
A Drive Auto roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a participant makes a successful CON roll or Drive Auto roll during the chase?
No change to MOV rating for the duration of the chase
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines a character's foot speed in the game?
A character's foot speed depends on their physical condition.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do drivers test their handling of a vehicle during a chase?
Drivers make a Drive Auto roll to test their handling of the vehicle.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a character makes a CON roll during a chase?
Each participant makes a CON roll to test their physical condition and endurance.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the end of a chase?
The character escapes if their adjusted MOV is higher than their pursuer.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a character fails a CON roll during a chase?
A failure results in a –1 to MOV rating for the duration of the chase.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of a 'Drive Auto roll'?
Drivers make a Drive Auto roll to test their handling of the vehicle.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the pursuer's MOV rating if the fleeing character's adjusted MOV rating is higher?
The fleeing character escapes.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the pursuer's MOV rating if they equal or exceed the fleeing character's adjusted MOV rating?
A chase is established.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the Keeper's game after a chase is established?
The Keeper should move the game on.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the Keeper's explanation of the chase's outcome?
The Keeper can narrate a brief explanation of how the chase occurs, or ask the players for suggestions.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines if a chase is established in the game?
The pursuer's adjusted MOV rating is equal to or greater than that of the fleeing character.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where should the Keeper move the action after a chase is established?
The point at which the pursuer is just two locations behind.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of setting the starting range for a chase?
To focus play on the exciting part of the chase, specifically 'cut to the chase'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the Keeper set the starting range beyond two locations?
No, it is advised not to set the range beyond two locations.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why should the Keeper move the action onto the point at which the pursuer is two locations behind?
To give the fleeing character a second chance to escape after using the speed roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the typical range set by the Keeper for the fleeing character?
Two locations
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an exceptional circumstance that may reduce the chase range to one location?
Tenser circumstances
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Harvey's movement after he makes an Extreme CON roll?
It is raised from 6 to 7
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the farmer's movement after failing the CON roll?
It drops from 7 to 6
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the chase if Harvey fails his CON roll?
The chase is established partway down the farm track with the farmer
